page.title: 09 My Favourite T.V Programmes
page.content: I have a colour T.V at home and I have a few favourite programmes. The first one is Bonanza.I like it because every programme in the series is full of fun and drama.My favourite character is Hoss because he is always eating . Another one of my favourite programmes is Emmerdale Farm because the conversation is always interesting. I also like So You Want To Be Top because the games are so full of fun. My least favourite game is the Fib Game. At school my favourite programme is Music Time.I like it because the people ask the viewers questions. Another school programme is Zig Zag.This term it is about flowers, fruit and vegetables.
